update.description:
I wanted pull request #1199 merged so I could make another pull request, but there was a test failure I didn't notice at the time:
~~~
[ RUN      ] PhysicsEngines/HeightmapTest.PhysicsLoad/1
...
Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
[Switching to Thread 0x7fffd9828700 (LWP 6940)]
gazebo::math::Vector3::Vector3 (this=0x7fffd9826fc0, _x=@0x68: <error reading variable>, _y=@0x70: <error reading variable>, 
    _z=@0x78: <error reading variable>) at /tmp/gazebo_build/source/gazebo/math/Vector3.cc:42
42	    : x(_x), y(_y), z(_z)
(gdb) bt
#0  gazebo::math::Vector3::Vector3 (this=0x7fffd9826fc0, _x=@0x68: <error reading variable>, _y=@0x70: <error reading variable>, 
    _z=@0x78: <error reading variable>) at /tmp/gazebo_build/source/gazebo/math/Vector3.cc:42
#1  0x00007ffff198b270 in ConvertVector3 (_bt=...) at /tmp/gazebo_build/source/gazebo/physics/bullet/BulletTypes.hh:62
#2  ConvertPose (_bt=...) at /tmp/gazebo_build/source/gazebo/physics/bullet/BulletTypes.hh:96
#3  gazebo::physics::BulletMotionState::setWorldTransform (this=0x7fffd43ac930) at /tmp/gazebo_build/source/gazebo/physics/bullet/BulletMotionState.cc:58
#4  0x00007ffff1970a10 in gazebo::physics::BulletHeightmapShape::Init (this=<optimized out>)
    at /tmp/gazebo_build/source/gazebo/physics/bullet/BulletHeightmapShape.cc:97
#5  0x00007ffff75e1062 in gazebo::physics::Collision::Init (this=0x7fffd68249a0) at /tmp/gazebo_build/source/gazebo/physics/Collision.cc:108
#6  0x00007ffff7620eb0 in gazebo::physics::Link::Init (this=this@entry=0x7fffd413c420) at /tmp/gazebo_build/source/gazebo/physics/Link.cc:241
#7  0x00007ffff197ed06 in gazebo::physics::BulletLink::Init (this=0x7fffd413c420) at /tmp/gazebo_build/source/gazebo/physics/bullet/BulletLink.cc:72
#8  0x00007ffff7632fe7 in gazebo::physics::Model::Init (this=0x7fffd42c2e10) at /tmp/gazebo_build/source/gazebo/physics/Model.cc:171
#9  0x00007ffff76609bb in gazebo::physics::World::Init (this=0x7fffd4d53a00) at /tmp/gazebo_build/source/gazebo/physics/World.cc:332
#10 0x00007ffff7645cb2 in gazebo::physics::init_worlds () at /tmp/gazebo_build/source/gazebo/physics/PhysicsIface.cc:93
#11 0x00000000004422e5 in gazebo::Server::LoadImpl (this=this@entry=0x7fffd4a3b690, _elem=..., _physics=...) at /tmp/gazebo_build/source/gazebo/Server.cc:402
#12 0x0000000000442cdc in gazebo::Server::LoadFile (this=0x7fffd4a3b690, _filename=..., _physics=...) at /tmp/gazebo_build/source/gazebo/Server.cc:304
#13 0x0000000000455032 in ServerFixture::RunServer (this=0x8e9ed0, _worldFilename=..., _paused=<optimized out>, _physics=...)
    at /tmp/gazebo_build/source/test/ServerFixture.cc:219
#14 0x00007ffff5ab3a4a in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_thread.so.1.54.0
#15 0x00007ffff66e4182 in start_thread (arg=0x7fffd9828700) at pthread_create.c:312
#16 0x00007ffff4700fbd in clone () at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/x86_64/clone.S:111
(gdb)
~~~
The key element is the change to [BulletMotionState.cc](#!/osrf/gazebo/commits/1eaf9674dd66c0266a54216e3beaf68a4feb27cd#chg-gazebo/physics/bullet/BulletMotionState.cc), which presumed the existence of a bullet link data structure, which was being accessed too early by the `BulletHeightmap::Init` function class.

The Jenkins gpu jobs are required to see this test failure, but they are currently not running due to build machine issues.
